Let's Get Started

Now that we have introduced the tools and concepts you will use to detect fraud, you'll have the opportunity to try it yourself.

We will present three examination scenarios. At the start of each scenario, the examiner-in-charge at each examination will introduce you to your role. It is your duty to perform your role – and detect any fraud that you might encounter. How you choose to pursue the risk is up to you.
 

  • For information on how to review the red flags in any document, simply click the help icon – or refer to the relevant tasks in the Fraud Reference Tool.
  • If you need help or get stuck, simply return to your EIC at any time to seek advice – or inform him or her of your findings.
    •  

Now, let's get started!
